intension: Create a graphic image to announce the launch of a new app. The image should showcase the app on a laptop screen and include text promoting a free trial. The overall design should convey a sense of modernity and sophistication, reflecting the cutting-edge technology of the app. Text should include the phrase 'is the silent ambassador of your brand', emphasizing the app's importance for businesses.
globalcaption: The image features a laptop computer with a black screen, placed on a wooden desk. The laptop is open, and the screen is turned off. A cell phone is positioned in front of the laptop, with the screen facing the viewer. The cell phone is also turned on, displaying its screen. The scene appears to be a simple and minimalistic setup, possibly for work or study purposes.
keywords: application, business, code, data, development, digital, it, program, programming, software, technology, web, tb, tbo, startup, it, launch, laptop, screen, black, phone, mockup, post

bglayer.bgcaption: The image features a laptop computer with a black screen, sitting on a wooden desk. The laptop is positioned in the center of the desk, and it appears to be the main focus of the scene. The wooden surface of the desk is visible in the foreground, providing a contrasting background for the laptop

objlayer.objcaption: The image features a white background with a large, thin cell phone prominently displayed. The cell phone is positioned vertically, taking up a significant portion of the image. To the right of the cell phone, there is a smaller, square-shaped object, which appears to be a remote control. The remote control is placed at a slight angle, with its top edge slightly above the cell phone

body.text: is the silent ambassador of your brand
